description:
If you gain 100 hundred pounds in several years but spend the last few months losing five, does that mean your weight is better than ever? That is exactly the logic the left keeps using when they try to gaslight Americans to vote against their best interest.

In a thriving economy, moms don’t have to choose between school supplies or paying bills. If people's finances were better than ever, you wouldn't have to keep telling voters that. Especially, because an empty wallet speaks otherwise.

So while families are suffering under one of the worst
title: Fox News Contributor Calls Out Analyst Claiming Economy Is Better Than Ever: ‘Not For Moms Buying Groceries’

description:
Kamala Harris is more radical than Bernie Sanders, which is why many Americans are concerned with voting for someone who previously vowed to ban fracking. While actions speak louder than words, her campaign is demanding you take her word that she is as moderate as Tulsi Gabbard.

However, Sanders has officially cleared up any confusion and admitted that Harris has not actually changed her stance on the issues but is just trying to change her tone to gaslight voters into believing she’s not one of the most radical politicians in American history.


"She has to do this to win"

Bernie Sanders admits that Kamala is hiding her Marxist ideolo
title: Bernie Sanders Admits Kamala Is Pretending To Not Be Radical Until After Election

description:
Gun rights are women’s rights.

A mother is being punished for saving her daughter's life, and authorities are victim-blaming her as if she acted wrongly to rescue her child from danger.

There is no reason a strange man should climb into a young lady’s bedroom at night for anything conceptual or moral. People don’t just trespass into a girl's bedroom because they are about to do something that isn't evil.

It’s unclear exactly what the motives of one suspect were when he tried to break into a young woman’s room but authorities have basically punished the mother for saving her daughter's life.


BREAKING: Legal gun owner fires at thug in Chicago climbing into daughter's room

CPD respond by confiscating her gun
title: Police Confiscate Gun From Mother With Concealed Carry After Shooting Man Climbing Through Daughter's Window

description:
Although Trump may be preparing for the debate, there’s no doubt that he is not “practicing” for it and that he didn’t “practice” when he was running against Biden. And even though Sleepy Joe probably rested for the debate, he likely didn't “practice” either. However, the same is not true for our DEI pick no one voted for.


NEW: Kamala Harris is holding mock debates with a ‘fake Trump’ to prepare for the debate on Tuesday.

Has anyone seen Shane Gillis lately?

Harris is using a stand in for debate prep who studies Trump and his mannerisms to partially imitate him during prep.

The stand in is… pic.twitter.com/4cjX3gptiv
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg)
title: Harris Campaign Prepares For Debate By Practicing With A ‘Fake Trump’

description:
While the media claims it’s a racist conspiracy theory to accuse Haitian migrants of eating pets and decapitating birds, the evidence and eye-witness testimony prove otherwise.

Since Springfield, Ohio has been flooded with 20,000 Haitians things have gotten out of control, to say the very least. Subsequently, Americans and their pets are suffering because of this de facto invasion. Additionally, before the invasion, this town only had 60,000 residents. This means a third of its population has been overrun by people from a third-world country who should not even be here for reasons no one can explain.

Residents are now speaking out, as they and their pets increasingly suffer
title: Springfield, Ohio Residents Warn Haitians Are Decapitating Ducks And Eating Them

description:
E. Jean Carroll has a tradition of accusing powerful men of sex crimes.

E. Jean Carroll claims Donald Trump raped her in a dressing room over 30 years ago. In 2012, "Law & Order: SVU" featured a rape scene in a Bergdorf Goodman dressing room, which is the same store of her accusations. However, according to Carroll, this is nothing more than a coincidence that “is bound to show up.”
title: Watch: Fact Checking E. Jean Carroll

description:
